name: Odyssey (Flávio Abreu)
description:
Odyssey, is a 2D space shooter where enemies swarm you until you finally reach the big boss and try to defeat it with all the power-ups you can get.

As my first game made in Unity, this project was completed in one week, back in December 2019, as a part of programming classes.

I worked on the game and level design, C# coding, and particle effects, using free stock 2D art assets.
